properties.entry: Biogeographical assessment of the conservation status of the species

Biogeographical assessments on the conservation status of the habitat types and species of Community interest have been carried out in EU 25 for the period 2001-2006, compiled as part of the Habitats Directive - Article 17 reporting process. The data summary sheet for species conservation status provides an overview per biogeographical region.
